name: Control Panel UI Init

movements.name: Init

beats.title: Init Config
acceptanceCriteria:
Given configuration metadata
When initConfig is called
Then configuration is loaded within 200ms
And all fields are prepared for rendering
And validation rules are attached

Given complex nested configuration
When initConfig processes it
Then all nested sections are initialized
And dependencies between sections are resolved
And no circular dependencies cause deadlock

Given configuration with 100+ fields
When initConfig prepares the form
Then initialization completes within 300ms
And form is ready for user interaction
And memory usage scales linearly with field count

Given configuration errors
When initConfig encounters invalid config
Then error is reported with specific issue
And fallback configuration is applied
And system degrades gracefully

Given performance SLA
When initConfig completes
Then Time to Interactive (TTI) is < 500ms
And First Contentful Paint (FCP) is < 1 second
And form is responsive immediately
beats.userStory: As a configuration system, I want initialization to complete in <200ms so that the form is interactive immediately (target: <500ms total TTI per RAIL model).

beats.title: Init Resolver
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the initResolver operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 500ms
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When initResolver processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When initResolver encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 500ms
When initResolver executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When initResolver operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want initResolver to execute reliably with latency < 500ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

movements.userStory: As a configuration system, I want initialization to complete in <200ms so that the form is interactive immediately (target: <500ms total TTI per RAIL model).
movements.businessValue: Enables fast form rendering; reduces user wait time by 40%; supports complex multi-section forms with instant initialization
